title: post message create message with inline embeddings
description: Test the POST /v1/messages endpoint to verify that a message is stored successfully with inline embedding generation, returning a 200 status and the correct message response structure.

title: post message create message with async embedding job
description: Test the POST /v1/messages endpoint to verify that a message is stored and an embedding job is enqueued asynchronously, returning a 202 status and the correct message response structure.

title: get message retrieve message by valid id
description: Test the GET /v1/messages/{message_id} endpoint to fetch a stored message by its UUID, expecting a 200 status and the correct message response data.

title: get message handle invalid message id format
description: Test the GET /v1/messages/{message_id} endpoint with an invalid UUID format to verify that the API returns a 400 validation error.

title: get message handle message not found
description: Test the GET /v1/messages/{message_id} endpoint with a valid UUID that does not exist in storage, expecting a 404 not found response.

title: get memory search perform semantic search with filters
description: Test the GET /v1/memory/search endpoint to perform a semantic search for memories filtered by tenant_id and optional conversation_id, verifying that the top-k relevant results are returned with correct scoring and within performance criteria.

title: post admin retention run apply retention policies
description: Test the POST /v1/admin/retention/run endpoint to trigger retention policies for a tenant, verifying that messages are archived or deleted according to specified actions and that dry run mode works correctly.

title: get admin health check service liveness
description: Test the GET /v1/admin/health endpoint to verify that the service liveness and health status are reported correctly with expected fields.

title: get admin readiness check service readiness
description: Test the GET /v1/admin/readiness endpoint to verify that the service readiness status is reported correctly, including degraded states if applicable.

title: post message enforce api key authentication
description: Test that all POST endpoints including /v1/messages and /v1/admin/retention/run enforce API key authentication, returning 401 Unauthorized for missing or invalid API keys.
